item.title: Pentagon stopping gender transition treatment for transgender troops
item.description: The Pentagon is ending gender transition treatment for transgender troops, as the Trump administration moves to boot them from the U.S. military.

item.title: Trump targets massive investments in first Middle East trip
item.description: President Donald Trump tours Persian Gulf allies to push $2T in deals, counter Iran and revive U.S. influence amid Gaza war, nuclear tensions.

item.title: Trump endorses Jack Ciattarelli for New Jersey governor: 'A winner'
item.description: President Donald Trump gave a full endorsement to Jack Ciattarelli in the race for governor of New Jersey on Monday. Ciattarelli was once a harsh crit...

item.title: Far-left mayor arrested at ICE facility denies impeding law enforcement, says protest 'absolutely' effective
item.description: Newark Mayor Ras Baraka said in a debate Monday his actions that got him arrested days earlier at an ICE facility were "absolutely" an effective prote...

item.title: Monica Crowley clears Senate confirmation for key State Department ambassadorship
item.description: Monica Crowley will now join the State Department in President Donald Trump's second administration. She was confirmed by the Senate on Monday night.
